scripts.capacitor:init: npx cap add android && npx cap add ios
scripts.build:web: (if exist www (rmdir /s /q www)) && mkdir www && xcopy public www /E /I /Y && copy index.html www && copy App.tsx www && copy index.tsx www && copy constants.tsx www && copy types.ts www && xcopy components www\components /E /I /Y && xcopy services www\services /E /I /Y
scripts.build:android-debug: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android && (cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug)
